title: Bridget's Calling
description: Brilliant, creative, charming Bridget Torjesen could have picked any career. She chose to be a high-priced escort, providing pleasure and companionship to those willing to pay. With the anarchist hacker Charlie as her booker, her friends in the Free Spirit Connection, and her diverse clientele,, Bridget's adventurous life is filled with erotic bliss - and fraught with many risks. But she is determined to rise to every challenge in pursuit of her calling.
author: Rikki de la Vega
